ygData.subject: Re: My thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: one of the gms I know is raatum he is a gnome and a very nice guide they should make him a full gm ... From: Drake, Robert, CTR, SAM-OPAA
ygData.messageBody:
one of the gms I know is raatum he is a gnome and a very nice guide they
should make him a full gm
----- Original Message -----
From: Drake, Robert, CTR, SAM-OPAA <Robert.Drake@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 6:54 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] My thoughts


> From: "Drake, Robert, CTR, SAM-OPAA" <Robert.Drake@...>
>
> I was at some wedding on Fen Ro a few weeks ago and one of the GMs there
was
> a gnome (Can't recall name now) At the end the gnome was casting some
> awesome spells that made the whole area light up with amazing techno
colors.
> I didn't think to ask then if they were fireworks, tho. But it was the
most
> amazing light show I've seen on EQ. I wonder if they were infact the
> gnomish fireworks....?
>
> Kilkin Cobblepot (Fennin Ro Gem Chopper)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Catbik Tinkerton [mailto:catbik@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 12:03 AM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] My thoughts
>
> From: "Catbik Tinkerton" <catbik@...>
>
>
>
> >I think that fireworks were mentioned only as a marketing
> ploy, and not
> >actually put into the game. I hope someone dispels this
> thought, because
> >it
> >would make my year to please others with free fireworks
> shows.
>
